description:
Luffy and crew seek to best Captain Kuro, but they`ve prepared their defense on the wrong side of the island! All looks grim now that Usopp must face off against the Black Cat Pirates alone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash with the Black Cat Pirates! The Great Battle on the Slope!
Gekitotsu! Kuroneko Kaizoku Dan Sakamichi no Daikoubou!
Un affrontement violent ! La grande bataille contre l`équipage du Chat Noir !
Столкновение! Пиратская шайка Чёрной кошки, схватка на склоне!
การต่อสู้บนที่ลาดชัน! กลุ่มโจรสลัดแมวดำ ปรากฏตัว!
激战！黑猫海贼团 坡道上的攻防战！
激突! クロネコ海賊団坂道の大攻防!
